WorkItem.Description:
I set Text="{Binding UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" and it doesn't update.
I even tried getting BindingExpression of the TextProperty and explicitly updating source but it didn't work.

Comments.Message: Oh, that was simply because the default binding mode is set to OneWay, once I set it to TwoWay, works great.

For better or worse, there is a difference between WPF and SL when it comes to data binding. In many cases, SL favors OneWay, whereas WPF generally has TwoWay enabled by default, especially for properties like "Text".
